name: Memorres
description:
We are a team of self-motivated skilled professionals allied together with a common purpose of being branded as “People’s Company”. We are committed to build a strong partnership with our clients and strengthen their businesses by delivering solutions that add value. Our people thinks beyond the limitations of technology constraints to drive innovative solutions.
Memorres provides technology services, digital & business solutions that help transform their vision into reality. Our leaders, strategists, architects, creative directors, designers, developers & relationship builders are  committed to create brand experiences with  creativity and excellence to every engagement.
